snippet.title: Constance - Official Gameplay Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description: See the gorgeous but dangerous world of Constance in this new gameplay trailer for the upcoming 2D hand-drawn action-adventure game. Constance features a paintbrush-wielding artist, striving to escape from a colorful but decaying inner world, created by her declining mental health. Constance will be available on PC, PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch in 2025.
